ygData.subject: Where to go now?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently hit 49th with my druid.  A lot of the friends I made at lower levels (I am a grouping druid, didn t solo until level 35) have quit EQ and moved on,
ygData.messageBody:
I recently hit 49th with my druid.  A lot of the friends I made at lower levels (I am a grouping druid, didn't solo until level 35) have quit EQ and moved on, and my guild is made up of lower levels who aren't anywhere near able to group with me.  Where do you all suggest I go for exp and loot?  I'm not much of an explorer and so won't go to a zone I don't have a map of and preferably an escort (hehe).  I've tried Karnor's, but it's sooo hard to get a group there, and I got my face shoved through my head when I tried to kite in Burning Woods.  Any suggestions would be appreciated :)
 
Thanks,
Nymue
